From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Cliffjumper lay in a smoking pile, upsidown, and Caliburst could only
guess how uncompfortable it was, as he raised his gun in celebration.
But Caliburst had celebrated to early, as a grenade struck the ground
right in front of him, blowing the earth to shreds, as the explosion
sent the Targetmaster sailing through the air. He landed roughly on his
back, droping his gun.

Cliffjumper's wheels began to spin again, showing his signs of life, as
he groaned in pain. He transformed, now on his stomach, and used his
arms to push himelf upright. <Decepticons>, he thought, <they must be on
the ship> he searched through his mind, as he took a step forwards, and
stumbled. He looked down, his foot was badly dammaged, smoke poured out
of two large holes of twisted metal. He aimed his gun down, and fired a
slight burst, and screamed in pain, as he heated the metal up. "Wish
Beachcomber was here." he whispered, as he bent down, and bended the
metal over, to cover the gash.
